text: Gloria Elizabeth Reuben (born June 9, 1964) is a Canadian actress and singer. She acts in both television series and movies. Reuben played Elizabeth Keckley in the 2012 movie Lincoln. She played Jeanie Boulet in the medical drama ER. Reuben was born in Toronto, Ontario. title: Gloria Reuben
